schema.label: លេខអត្តសញ្ញាណកម្មសារពើពន្ធ ៖ Tax Identification Number (TIN):
schema.intent: To identify the taxpayer's tax identification number.
schema.visual_anchor: Right side of the header section, below CAPITAL CONTRIBUTIONS AS AT.

schema.label:
Shareholder's Name
(Name of Individual/Legal Entity)
schema.intent: To record the name of the shareholder.
schema.visual_anchor: Left column of the Capital Contributions table, below the table header.

schema.label:
Current Address
of Shareholder
schema.intent: To record the current address of the shareholder.
schema.visual_anchor: Column next to 'Shareholder's Name', in the Capital Contributions table.

schema.label:
Position in
the Enterprise
schema.intent: To record the position of the shareholder in the enterprise.
schema.visual_anchor: Column next to 'Current Address of Shareholder', in the Capital Contributions table.

schema.label:
Beginning of the Period
%
schema.intent: To record the percentage of shares held at the beginning of the period.
schema.visual_anchor: Column under 'Beginning of the Period', in the 'Shares Held' section of the Capital Contributions table.

schema.label:
Beginning of the Period
Amount
schema.intent: To record the amount of shares held at the beginning of the period.
schema.visual_anchor: Column next to the percentage column under 'Beginning of the Period', in the 'Shares Held' section of the Capital Contributions table.

schema.label:
End of the Period
%
schema.intent: To record the percentage of shares held at the end of the period.
schema.visual_anchor: Column under 'End of the Period', in the 'Shares Held' section of the Capital Contributions table.

schema.label:
End of the Period
Amount
schema.intent: To record the amount of shares held at the end of the period.
schema.visual_anchor: Column next to the percentage column under 'End of the Period', in the 'Shares Held' section of the Capital Contributions table.

schema.label: A. Registered Capital / Share Capital
schema.intent: Record the registered capital for shareholder 1

schema.label: Total
schema.intent: To store the total registered capital.
schema.logic: Sum of all registered capital entries.

schema.label: B. Paid up Capital / Share Capital
schema.intent: Record the paid up capital for shareholder 1

schema.label: Total
schema.intent: To store the total paid up capital.
schema.logic: Sum of all paid up capital entries.
schema.visual_anchor: Below the paid up capital entries.

schema.label: Description
schema.visual_anchor: Left column of the 'INFORMATION ABOUT EMPLOYEES DURING THE PERIOD' table.

schema.label: Position
schema.intent: To record the position of the employee.
schema.visual_anchor: Column next to 'Description' in the employee information table.

schema.label: Number
schema.intent: To record the number of employees in that category.
schema.visual_anchor: Column next to 'Position' in the employee information table.

schema.label: Salary Excluding Fringe Benefits
schema.intent: To record the salary excluding fringe benefits.
schema.visual_anchor: Column next to 'Number' in the employee information table.

schema.label: Fringe Benefits
schema.visual_anchor: Column next to 'Salary Excluding Fringe Benefits' in the employee information table.

schema.label: Total Employees and Workers
schema.intent: To record the total number of employees and workers.
schema.visual_anchor: Bottom section of the employee information table.

schema.label: Taxable Salary for Employees and Workers
schema.intent: To record the taxable salary for employees and workers.
schema.visual_anchor: Bottom row of the employee information table.
